title: big interface probleme!!!
body:
i just bought the best dell inspirion 15 7000 gaming series i installed league and everything was fine it runs perfectly at max settings but i have one huge probleme the pv bars of the champions and the minions and the monsters are reaaaally tiny and also the mouse clicker and the tower on the map .. i cant play 
like that please help how do i change that thank you for your respond.

replies.body: Your rig's drivers and settings may just be outdated and need a tune up if it's still on factory settings.  I recommend using our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide for steps on updating your drivers and making sure your new pc is in its best shape to game.  Also, keep in mind that you can have this issue if your resolution is set too high (I noticed the monitor might support 4K).  4K is not currently supported, so you may need to reduce your in-game resolution as well as your monitor for your best display.  Let me know if you have any questions.
